modShortDescription: Perks no longer give recipes, now you can only craft the recipes you find. You can still choose the perks, you just have to actually find recipes.
modDescription:
Perks no longer give recipes, now you can only craft the recipes you find.

You can still choose the perks, they will have the other benefits, you just have to actually find recipes. Now some recipes are only gotten from a perk, and those stayed in.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/wolfbain5/7dtd-a18/tree/master/No%20recipe%20challenge)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/14626-wolfbain5-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Wolfbain5](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/wolfbain5/)
